eu_methane_pneumatic_devices.description: Prohibits venting from pneumatic devices unless unavoidable; requires replacement of continuous bleed devices with zero-emitting alternatives by 2027 (Art.15).
eu_methane_pneumatic_devices.automated_check_scope: Partial automated check using Subpart W flags and counts. Does not verify replacement plans or actual bleed rates; field audits required for exemptions. Full phase-out by 2027.
eu_methane_pneumatic_devices.output_if_compliant: No emissions or prohibited devices reported. Verify transition to zero-emitting by 2027 and exemptions for unavoidable venting (Art.15(3)).
eu_methane_pneumatic_devices.output_if_noncompliant: Action Required: Minimize venting; replace venting devices with non-emitting alternatives (Art.15(1)). Report per Art.12.

eu_methane_routine_venting_flaring.description: Prohibits routine venting and flaring from Jan 2025, except emergencies or unavoidable cases; prefers flaring over venting only if no alternatives (Art.15).
eu_methane_routine_venting_flaring.automated_check_scope: Partial; aggregates uncontrolled CH4 as proxy for routine. Does not verify justifications; applies to exports via importers (Art.28). Phase-in to Feb 2026 for existing.
eu_methane_routine_venting_flaring.output_if_compliant: No uncontrolled CH4 reported - compliant with Art.15, subject to verification of any events as emergency/unavoidable.
eu_methane_routine_venting_flaring.output_if_noncompliant: Potential violation: Eliminate routine venting/flaring; justify and minimize any events (Art.15(2)). Notify events >8h within 48h (Art.16).

eu_methane_flare_stacks.description: Routine flaring prohibited; ≥99% DRE for new/refurbished, by 2026 for existing; auto-igniters required (Art.17).
eu_methane_flare_stacks.automated_check_scope: Partial; checks efficiency proxy. Inspections every 15 days not in data. For non-EU, importers verify equivalent (Art.28).
eu_methane_flare_stacks.output_if_compliant: Efficiency meets threshold. Verify auto-igniters, 15-day inspections (Annex IV), and no routine use (Art.17).
eu_methane_flare_stacks.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Upgrade to ≥99% DRE; install monitoring; limit to unavoidable (Art.17). Report events (Art.16).

eu_methane_atmospheric_tanks.description: Venting prohibited except gauging/sampling if unavoidable; zero-emitting designs for new/refurbished post-2026 (Art.15).
eu_methane_atmospheric_tanks.automated_check_scope: Partial; checks no venting proxy. For facilities post-2023 data, flag if emissions >0. Non-EU via importer MRV (Art.27).
eu_methane_atmospheric_tanks.output_if_compliant: No venting reported. Verify zero-emitting for new tanks and minimize events (Art.15(3)).
eu_methane_atmospheric_tanks.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Prohibit venting; capture vapors or justify unavoidable (Art.15). Report events >8h (Art.16).

eu_methane_well_completions_workovers.description: Prohibits venting during completions/workovers except emergencies/unavoidable; capture or flare with 99% efficiency (Art.15).
eu_methane_well_completions_workovers.automated_check_scope: Partial using Subpart W; checks no non-REC/venting. Field verification for mitigation needed. Phase to 2026.
eu_methane_well_completions_workovers.output_if_compliant: All RECs, no venting. Verify capture/flaring and justifications (Art.15(2)).
eu_methane_well_completions_workovers.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Use capture or 99% flare; prohibit routine venting (Art.15). Report events (Art.16).

eu_methane_liquids_unloading.description: Venting allowed only if unavoidable for clean-up; minimize and justify (Art.15(3b)).
eu_methane_liquids_unloading.automated_check_scope: Partial; checks zero emissions/proxy. Best practices not in data.
eu_methane_liquids_unloading.output_if_compliant: No venting reported. Verify minimization and unavoidable cases (Art.15).
eu_methane_liquids_unloading.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Minimize venting; use alternatives; report events >8h (Art.16).

eu_methane_reciprocating_compressors.description: Prohibits venting except normal ops if minimized; LDAR required (Art.15,14).
eu_methane_reciprocating_compressors.automated_check_scope: Partial; emissions proxy. No packing replacement in data.
eu_methane_reciprocating_compressors.output_if_compliant: No emissions. Verify LDAR surveys and repairs (Art.14).
eu_methane_reciprocating_compressors.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Capture emissions; implement LDAR (Art.15,14).

eu_methane_centrifugal_compressors.description: Prohibits venting except if unavoidable; capture for wet seals; LDAR (Art.15,14).
eu_methane_centrifugal_compressors.automated_check_scope: Partial; checks absence/emissions. Seal types not in data.
eu_methane_centrifugal_compressors.output_if_compliant: No emissions/presence. Verify capture and LDAR (Art.14).
eu_methane_centrifugal_compressors.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Minimize venting; apply LDAR surveys (Art.15).

eu_methane_leaks_fugitives.description: LDAR program with surveys (2-4x/year); repair >500-5000 ppm within 5-15 days (Art.14).
eu_methane_leaks_fugitives.automated_check_scope: Highly partial; emissions proxy. Cannot check surveys/repairs. Program submission May 2025.
eu_methane_leaks_fugitives.output_if_compliant: Zero emissions. Verify LDAR program, surveys (Annex I frequencies), repairs (Art.14(4)).
eu_methane_leaks_fugitives.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Submit LDAR program by May 2025; conduct surveys and repairs (Art.14). Report annually (Art.12).
